name: disarming-voice
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Ignores accuracy and evasion.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.
